price: 70. Toen hij tegen zijn vader en zijn volk zei: “Wie aanbidden jullie?”
arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوۡمِهِۦ مَا تَعۡبُدُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: idh qāla li-abīhi waqawmihi mā taʿbudūna
